name: Summon Charged Atronach
description: Summon an immobile storm atronach at the target location. Its arrival deals 2323 Shock Damage and stuns enemies for 3 seconds. The atronach zaps the closest enemy, dealing 1124 Shock Damage every 1 second, and periodically deals 2323 Shock Damage to enemies around it.  An ally near the atronach can activate the Charged Lightning synergy, granting the ally and the atronach Major Berserk, increasing their damage done by 10% for 8 seconds.
effectLines: The atronach gains a powerful area of effect attack.

The atronach zaps the closest enemy, dealing $2 Shock Damage every 1 second, and periodically deals $3 Shock Damage to enemies around it.  An ally near the atronach can activate the Charged Lightning synergy, granting the ally and the atronach Major Berserk, increasing their damage done by 10% for 8 seconds.
